      • getInstance

        public IBusinessApplicationPluginExecutor getInstance()
        Get a proxy reference to the default executor. Make sure the instance is closed after use. 
         try (IBusinessApplicationPluginExecutor executor = registry.getExecutor()) {
   executor.execute(parameters);
 }
        Returns:
        The instance
        See Also:
        CloseableResourceProxy
